description:
Katsuhira catches up to Sonozaki in order to try to stop her from trying to connect everyone to the Kizna System.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If the Kizna System Spread Throughout the World
Quand le système Kizna s`étendra dans le monde entier
Sekaijuu ni Kizuna System ga Hirogatte
世界中にキズナシステムが広がって
